EmailTemplate.subject: You Haven’t Upgraded Your Transponder Yet!? Time’s Ticking Away…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Primus 1000 / 2000 Operator, Time is flying towards the 2020 ADS-B Out mandate compliance deadline.
Don't mark January 2020 on your calendar.Mark June 2019 or before!
Why June?
- Upgrading usually takes of 10 days per aircraft, if the parts on are on the floor ready and waiting. - There are hundreds of non-compliant aircraft requiring upgrade and only a small number of service centers.
So, if you haven't scheduled your plane by June, you may be stuck. Unless you are willing to pay a very hefty premium.
Guarantee compliance, schedule today. The clock is ticking...
FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_ADS-B.html]]>
